name: RetroSS (Prototype)
description:
Retro like Space Shooter, made on the My First Game Jam 2020 Summer, created from scratch as a first game development project. All assets were created by myself (really all of them).
It is a prototype for testing a level spawining enemies with basic move patterns, and a final boss with weak points.

Each enemy or weak points of the boss are only really affected by one type of bullet, when hitted with other type of bullet the damage is very low. Then the player must change the type of bullet to keep going safe.

HOW TO PLAY

Keyboard:

  • Arrow Keys: Move
  • Left-Ctrl: Shoot
  • SpaceBar: Change type of bullet

Control pad (XBox360 like):

  • Left Stick: Move
  • Button X: Shoot
  • Button A: Change type of bullet
